Aerial parts of T. montanum (
F (
m )) were sampled, in June 2020, in Contrada Quacella on the Madonie Mountains (Sicily, Italy) in an environment of mountain garrigue on Dolomite substrates, between 1450 and 1550 m of altitude in an area whose center had coordinates 37°50′49.78″ N; 14°1′22.59″ E. A voucher of the population analyzed was deposited in the herbarium of the University of Palermo (PAL 109708).
